embeds.title: o7 Help
embeds.description:
**Most all commands have their own help available by sending the word "help"  after the command** 
for example: !bp help

*This documentation assumes commands use the prefix `!` a server may have configured a different prefix for commands.*

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
**!blueprint** or **!bp** - Get information about what it will take to manufacture items.

**!blueprintm** or **!bpm** - Mobile friendly display for blueprints

**!pricecheck** or **!pc** - Retrieves market data based on provided search terms.

**!planetaryresources** or **!pr** - Discover the location of a desired planetary resource within a number of jumps from any system.

**!jumps** or **!j** - Find out the shortest jumps distance between two systems.

**!safejumps** or **!sj** - Find out the distance to travel between two systems if using the safer option that prefers hi sec systems over low & null.

fields.name: Beta Commands
fields.value:
*Beta commands are works in progress and may have missing information and/or missing features*

**!item** or **!i** - Look up details about any item in game quickly! Get the full stats of any ship!  *work in progress, not all info is available yet*

**!apply** - Will ask the user questions that have been configured by the server admins and post the users answers in a specified channel.

fields.name: Informational Commands
fields.value:
**!help** - Displays this help text.

**!changelog** - Want to know what the most recent changes are with your favorite Eve Echoes bot? Just ask, and I'll send them to you.

**!dataretention** - View the data retention policy for this bot.

**!invite** - Get a link you can use to invite this bot to your server.

embeds.title: Administrative Commands
embeds.description: By default, these commands require administrator permissions on your server to execute.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value:
**!prefix** - Set a custom prefix that this bot will respond to on your server.

**!appconfig** - Used to set the questions the bot will ask a user who uses the **!apply** command as well as the channel completed applications will be posted to.

**!setrole** - Assigns discord role to a member.

embeds.title: Support the developer
embeds.description:
You can support me on Patreon!

Your support will help to keep o7 regularly updated and allow me to spend the time to add new features.

Supporters will receive a unique role on the o7 Dev discord and you can even gain access to the development build of o7 to test out features before they are released!

https://www.patreon.com/o7bot

fields.name: If you want to support, but don't have the $
fields.value:
You can send me ISK in Eve Echoes! Time I don't spend farming means more time I can spend adding features to this bot.

Send ISK via contract to `Evelyn Bray` in Eve Echoes. Be sure to tell me your Discord ID on the contract if you'd like the supporter role on the o7 Dev Discord server.

fields.name: o7 Dev Discord
fields.value:
Thank you for taking the time to use my bot. I am always open to suggestions for this bot on my development server.
<https://discord.gg/PfruVg4>

fields.name: Invite o7 to your own Discord server
fields.value: If you would like to invite this bot to your own discord, you may use this link <https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=753820564665270333&scope=bot&permissions=268954688>

fields.name: Market Data
fields.value: Special Thanks to <https://www.reddit.com/user/eve-echoes-market/> for creating <https://eve-echoes-market.com> where this bot queries for market data.
